poolList.table.asset.tip: Choose the asset you want to supply to start earning APY
poolList.table.supply.tip: Total amount of the corresponding asset deposited in Gearbox
poolList.table.borrowed.tip: Total amount of the corresponding asset borrowed from Gearbox
poolList.table.deposit.tip: Annual percentage yield that you earn for supplying capital. This number constantly changes as the utilization of the pools goes up and down
poolList.table.borrowAPY.tip: Annual percentage yield that borrowers pay for borrowing capital. This number constantly changes as the utilization of the pools goes up and down

onboarding.creditAccountList.block1: A Credit Account is a new DeFi primitive which allows users to open composable leveraged positions on any whitelisted DeFi protocol. You can see a Credit Account as your automated DeFi wallet where you not only open positions, but can also program them.
modal.ethglobal.title: Thanks
modal.ethglobal.body: Thanks for all Marketmake ETH Global team, sponsors and Kartik Talwar personally. You are the best 🎉🎉🎉
screens.settingsScreen.title: Settings
screens.selectActionScreen.title: Open credit account
screens.poolsListScreen.title: Passive Pools
screens.poolsListScreen.window.title: Passive Pools
screens.poolsListScreen.help.interest.ti: Where is the yield/interest coming from?
screens.poolsListScreen.help.interest.de: The asset you supply to the protocol would be able to be utilized, aka borrowed for leverage, by traders & farmers who would be actively rebalancing their positions or using some strategies. As borrowers, they will be required by the protocol to pay interest rates which accrue to the underlying pools of those assets - that is, to you!
Also, Gearbox DAO has a liquidity mining campaign live right now, so you also earn $GEAR.
screens.poolsListScreen.help.supply.titl: How safe is supplying liquidity to Gearbox?
screens.poolsListScreen.help.supply.desc: Gearbox Protocol is decentralized and open-source, and has no one person controlling anything. It has also been audited more than 6 times, has a live bug bounty, as well as different risk teams doing their best to keep the protocol safe. However, no DeFi protocol is fully protected from hacks or manipulations, so please understand the risks involved which are
screens.poolsListScreen.help.liquidation: How safe is supplying liquidity to Gearbox?

You can't be liquidated and you don't need to actively manage anything. Earning with Gearbox is as simple as lending on Compound or Aave. Next to that, the pools are isolated. Supply liquidity in the asset you choose and start earning APY! Then just sit sit tight, wait, and pray to the blockchain.
screens.poolsListScreen.help.claim.title: Where can I claim my GEAR APR?
screens.poolsListScreen.help.claim.descr: The organic APY you are earning from utilization by Credit Accounts - accrues to your dTokens (Diesel Tokens) automatically, so there is no extra action required. As for the GEAR APR liquidity mining, the DAO is planning to make claim contracts available every 3 weeks or so, which you can keep track of on
Don't worry, GEAR are accruing to you every block, just like they did in DeFi Summer 2020!

screens.strategiesList.banner: This page will help you ape into complicated strategies with just 1 click! You decide your debt asset (what you borrow) as well as your leverage exposure. Our 1-click multicall will then swap-deposit-stake into a farm of your choosing, while finding the best route for it. Happy farming!

dialogs.closeCreditAccountDialog.title: Close Credit Account
dialogs.closeCreditAccountDialog.swapChe: Select the assets that you want to swap to underlying {symbol}. All other assets will be sent directly to your address. This is only possible if you have enough in the underlying asset to repay the debt.
components.closeCreditAccountDialog.tota: Total value of assets swapped to {symbol}
closeCreditAccountDialog.tip: Repay the debt and get all the assets from your Credit Account to your wallet. This option is possible only if your wallet balance in the denominated asset is at least of the amount required for repaying the debt.
components.strategiesBanner.title: Strategies with up to 30% APY
components.strategiesBanner.text: Use leverage to earn up to 30% APY on stablecoins and ETH - via Curve, Convex, Lido, Yearn, and others. You choose your collateral and your own risk parameters. One-click aping will save your time and gas!

components.tipWindow.title: Tip
components.helpBar.creditDetails.title: A Credit Account is a new DeFi primitive which allows users to open composable leveraged positions on any whitelisted DeFi protocol. You can see a Credit Account as your automated DeFi wallet where you not only open positions, but can also program them.
components.helpBar.poolsList.title: A Credit Account is a new DeFi primitive which allows users to open composable leveraged positions on any whitelisted DeFi protocol. You can see a Credit Account as your automated DeFi wallet where you not only open positions, but can also program them.
You can open positions or trade either using Gearbox interface which can find the best path for you, or Connect to native applications of whitelisted protocols with Wallet Connect.
components.helpBar.creditAccountList.tit: A Credit Account is a new DeFi primitive which allows users to open composable leveraged positions on any whitelisted DeFi protocol. You can see a Credit Account as your automated DeFi wallet where you not only open positions, but can also program them.
components.helpBar.walletConnect.title: Using Wallet Connect, you can trade via native applications of whitelisted protocols. The video will show you how to do it. When trading, you would be able to approve transactions in your Metamask or another wallet without switching back to Gearbox interface. Make sure to keep this tab open in order to use this feature, similar to how you have it in Gnosis Safe.
components.helpBar.creditAccountManage.t: Manage your Credit Account by adding more collateral or increasing your leverage. Make sure to watch out for your health factor: keep it as high as possible!
